jogo mt bom recomendo
Wish I could've enjoyed the height of this game. Now it's just assets for Garry's Mod.

What is there to be said about Counter-Strike: Source that hasn't already been said? Absolutely nothing, that's what.

 I could tell you about the sleepless nights of my childhood I spend grinding this game until I passed out or my hands went numb with pain, but I'm guessing you have similar stories. I could tell you about the orgasmic feeling of a cross map deagle headshot, but you already know exactly what I'm talking about. I could tell you about the flow state movement of surf and bhop, or the rich history of Counter-Strike: Source, from esports to fragmovies to memes to legends, but you've already seen it all. I could talk about all the friends I made playing this game and all the things this game has given me over the years, but I know its given you the same things too.

Nothing more needs to be said. This game speaks for itself.

I would most definately recommend it to all friends or anyone interested in Legit Shooter games. I would have to say it is a very accurate Lo graphic required first person shooter game. Pin point accuracy in game shooting.
